Txt_Talk_Volcano_Out_Ground_01_1.Text: Throw the Mountaincleaver into the volcano?

Txt_Talk_Volcano_Out_Ground_01_3.Text: My, my. It's been some time since one of your kind dared come here.

Txt_Talk_Volcano_Out_Ground_01_4.Text: Allow me to humbly suggest that you turn back if you value your life. I'm a stone-cold killer, as it happens.

Txt_Talk_Volcano_Out_Ground_01_5.Text: Heh. It's funny, your gormless face reminds me of this fool I once sent for a dip in the magma. You should've heard how he wailed in agony as he fell...

Txt_Talk_Volcano_Out_Ground_01_6.Text: Once you suffer the same fate, I'm sure Lord Baramos will reward me...just as he did back then.

Txt_Talk_Volcano_Out_Ground_01_7.Text: Well, I hope you like it hot!

Txt_Talk_Volcano_Out_Ground_01_9.Text: A massive amount of magma bubbles away in the crater.

Txt_Talk_Volcano_Out_MAIN_0_BATTLE_END_0.Text: I was chosen...by the Archfiend himself...
I see it now... It was no...passing resemblance...
Curse you... Curse you, human scum!

Txt_Talk_Volcano_Erupted_Out_SUB_0_VOLUM.Text: {LEADER} calms the monster with a soothing voice and tells it about Monty's monster menagerie...
